main.name: Linear Regression for Housing Prices
main.description: For this project, a simple Linear Regression model predicts 1990 California housing prices

overview.title: Dataset and Library
overview.description1a: Two separate models were created using Scikit Learn's LinearRegression module and PySpark's MLLib to use the LinearRegression module.
overview.description1b: The dataset consisted of 20640 rows of median housing values with 10 columns, as seen in the image below.
